price: ߊ߬ ߘߎߟߋ߲ ߠߎ߫ ߛߎ߬ߘߎ߲߬ߡߊ߲߫ ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߸ ߊ߬ ߦߙߌߘߋ߲߫ ߞߊߘߌ ߞߟߏߣߍ߲߫ ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߟߎߓߍ߫
arabic: وَدَانِيَةً عَلَيۡهِمۡ ظِلَٰلُهَا وَذُلِّلَتۡ قُطُوفُهَا تَذۡلِيلٗا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wadāniyatan ʿalayhim ẓilāluhā wadhullilat quṭūfuhā tadhlīlan
